caption.p: 3D visualization and reconstruction of the breast tumor and intercostal lymph node. (A) The tumor mass (red mass) located at 5 and 6 o'clock positions in the right breast from the front view. (B) The metastatic intercostal lymph node (blue node) behind the tumor was close to the upper edge of the right fifth rib and adjacent to the right lower pleura from the right-side view.
